Tenant Information
================ =
W0125-23WR02 Shop Towel Exchange Service Sol B
-------------------------------------------------
*   Solicitation ID: WS4273543839
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Tender Closing Date: 16 November 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Bid Description**
-------------------
This solicitation superseded an earlier one (WS3974526228 dated 27 April 2023). Interested suppliers are invited to respond to this request for proposals for the supply of shop towels to the 86 Airfield Systems and Utilities Flight (86 ASU) located on Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton, Quinte West, ON.

The purpose of the bid is to procure a shop towel exchange service that meets the operational requirements of the 86 ASU, which is a Canadian Forces unit specializing in construction engineering, including aircraft arresting systems, water and fuel systems, and large generator enclosures. The operational activities of the unit generate shop towels contaminated with various industrial substances, thereby necessitating the provision of clean replacement towels and pickup services for soiled items in accordance with standard industry practices.

The Bid Categories
-------------------
*   UNSPSC: 91111500 Laundering services
*   Geographic locations: Throughout Canada primarily servicing Canadian Forces Bases

Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
---------------------------------
*   Suppliers are required to provide a comprehensive response addressing the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.
*   Evaluation of proposals will be conducted on the basis of the lowest priced responsive bid.
*   Background and experience documents outlining the business, product/services offered, references and industry standards will be evaluated for completeness and accuracy.

Documents and Attachments
------------------------
*   Solicitation documents
*   Bidder's questions and responses document
*   Sample requirements summary and standard industry practices

Additional Information
-------------------
Questions and inquiries should be directed to Stork, Terri, (SPAC/PSPC) at terri.stork@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. The bidding exercise will be conducted via Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. Respondents must submit their bid electronically by 2:00 PM EDT on 16 November 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be available upon request to suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.
